item.title: About me
item.description:
Personal Profile

Basic Information

Name：Jinheng Jiang

Gender: Male

Currently studying: Zhengzhou University, majoring in Communication Engineering (expecting to transfer to Computer Science and Technology)

Interests and expected career paths

In terms of competitions, I am very interested in algorithmic competitions such as ACM-ICPC, and I am expected to participate in them during my college years in order to win awards.

As for my future development direction, I would like to work on machine learning and deep learning, but I’m not sure, it’s up to me.

Hobbies

I don’t have many hobbies, mainly playing games. I play a lot of soul, arpg, act, roguelite games, and sandbox games such as MC, which I also like to play.

I also like to play sandbox games such as MC. Here is a list of a few games that I really like:

Bloodborne

Dark Souls 3

Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice

Red Dead Redemption 2

Black Myth: Wukong

Dead Cells

If you want to exchange games with me, you can contact me:https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198365257706/ And PS platforms

The rest of the contact information

QQ: 2916321268

WeChat：13613763761

QQ mailbox:2917321268@qq.com

Outlook maibox:q29173212268@outlook.com

Gmail mailbox:jjhx330jinheng@gmail.com

item.title: Announcement
item.description:
Main content of this website

This website mainly shares hardcore content related to daily learning and some specialized knowledge, and exchanges knowledge and insights with everyone.

Some functions of this website

Basic functions: searching, categorizing, archiving…

Some special features: Kanban (supports dressing, switching characters, mouse interaction…) , interactive dynamic background, light and dark mode switching.

New features that may come later: mouse cursor style change, font change…

Notes

Chinese users may not be able to load Kanban properly after entering the site, you may need to open a VPN.

Finally

Welcome to my website!!!
